extDescription.message: YouTube に表示される視聴者数、高評価数、登録者数を隠します。

optionViews.description: Option to hide the number of viewers.

optionTooltip.message: 視聴者数を含むツールチップ
optionTooltip.description: Option to hide a tooltip with the number of viewers.

optionSubscribers.description: Option to hide the number of subscribers.

optionVideoLikes.description: Option to hide the number of video likes.

optionCommentLikes.description: Option to hide the number of comment likes.
